video_prompt: Moss grows, miniature figures stroll under umbrellas, gondolas move across cables, steam rises. Liquid inside the mug ripples, chandeliers sway, light emanates. Spilled coffee shifts around the base.
image_prompt: A whimsical teal coffee mug containing a miniature world: mossy cityscape with tiny glowing buildings and figures under umbrellas, traversed by gondolas on overhead cables; the mug's interior holds a deep blue-green liquid with sparkling droplets, illuminated by hanging golden chandeliers, creating a magical self-contained universe.
refined_video_prompt: Moss visibly unfurls. Miniature figures stroll, umbrellas swaying. Gondolas glide across cables. Steam steadily ascends. Liquid in the mug gently ripples. Chandeliers subtly oscillate, as light emanates and expands. Spilled coffee slowly shifts and spreads around the base.
